result.Audio_result_false: Audio driver is not installed and the system cannot be used for Audio calls
result.Audio_result_chrome_false: Audio driver is not installed or Headset is not plugged in
result.Video_result_true: Webcam is working fine and Video calls can be made
result.Video_result_false: Webcam or its necessary drivers are not found and Video calls are not allowed

Lync web plugin is not installed. Please click the below button to install the plugin

bandwidth.net_average: Average network speed - Audio & Video are recommended
bandwidth.net_fast: Fast network speed - Audio, Video are recommended
